entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -19.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:17 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
